title: Understanding the CJMM
text: The Clinical Judgment Measurement Model (CJMM) is a framework used in the context of nursing.

title: Purpose of CJMM
text: Consider the purpose of the CJMM in relation to nursing licensure exams.

hintAnswer: A tool developed by the National Council of State Boards of Nursing to assist graduates to answer client care questions on the nurse licensure exam
title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Which of the following best describes the CJMM?
choices: A tool developed by the National Council of State Boards of Nursing to assist graduates to answer client care questions on the nurse licensure exam
A tool developed by the National Council of State Boards of Nursing to assist graduates to answer stigmatization questions
A tool developed by the National Council of State Boards of Nursing to assist graduates to answer diagnostic questions on the licensure exam
